name: Test of the Twins
summary: Test of the Twins is a fantasy novel by Margaret Weis and Tracy Hickman. It is the third and final book in the Dragonlance Legends, which along with the Dragonlance Chronicles are considered the core Dragonlance novels. The novel appeared on the NY Times Best Seller list.
info:
• 中文名: 试炼之卷
  • 册数: 1
  • 出版社: Random House
  • 发售日: 1986年8月
  • 页数: 330
  • ISBN: 0-88038-267-8
